001package com.pusher.rest.crypto.nacl;
002
003import java.security.SecureRandom;
004import java.util.HashMap;
005import java.util.Map;
006
007/**
008 * SecretBox class controls access to TweetNaclFast to prevent users from
009 * reaching out to TweetNaclFast. TweetNaclFast must stay package private.
010 */
011public class SecretBox {
012
013    private final static int NONCE_LENGTH = 24;
014
015    public static Map<String, byte[]> box(final byte[] key, final byte[] message) {
016        TweetNaclFast.SecretBox secretBox = new TweetNaclFast.SecretBox(key);
017
018        final byte[] nonce = new SecureRandom().generateSeed(NONCE_LENGTH);
019        final byte[] cipher = secretBox.box(message, nonce);
020
021        final Map<String, byte[]> res = new HashMap<>();
022        res.put("cipher", cipher);
023        res.put("nonce", nonce);
024
025        return res;
026    }
027
028    public static byte[] open(final byte[] key, final byte[] nonce, final byte[] cipher) {
029        TweetNaclFast.SecretBox secretBox = new TweetNaclFast.SecretBox(key);
030
031        final byte[] decryptedMessage = secretBox.open(cipher, nonce);
032
033        if (decryptedMessage == null) {
034            throw new RuntimeException("can't decrypt");
035        }
036
037        return decryptedMessage;
038    }
039}
